p.k: Text-based information service

p.n: The Rubbish World of Dave Spud I (21)

p.n: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series II (47)
p.k: 68% A Magic Day Out Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside, where his trunk gets accidentally swapped with that of a stage magician
